thread.section_title: GO Rentals New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GO Rentals New Zealand | www.gorentals.co.nz
thread.title: Lisa Hawkins
thread.title_full: GO Rentals New Zealand reviewed by Lisa Hawkins

author: Lisa Hawkins
title: Lisa Hawkins
text:
Go Rentals picked us up from
Auckland International Airport.
Their On Line Check In, the best. They took a copy of our drivers licences, they checked the vehicle for dents and scratches with us, took photos on their iPad, as we did on our phone, gave us the keys we were on our way.. it took no more than 5 - 10 minutes.
The car return was so easy, they checked the car dropped us off at the airport, 5 - 10 minutes done and dusted.
The hire fees for our trip was really competitive with other car rental companies if not cheaper than some.
The service was great, staff so friendly I'll definitely
be using them again.
A BIG THANK YOU GO RENTALS..ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š
